abstract: Yahoo’s Carol A. Bartz was greeted with good will when she joined as chief executive almost two years ago, but that is wearing thin, and at least one investor has already requested that the board replace her.
snippet: Yahoo’s Carol A. Bartz was greeted with good will when she joined as chief executive almost two years ago, but that is wearing thin, and at least one investor has already requested that the board replace her.
lead_paragraph: The relative good will that greeted Carol A. Bartz when she started at Yahoo as chief executive almost two years ago is wearing thin.

headline.main: Even Under New Chief, Yahoo Seems Adrift
